title: "Qualification Report"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(here)
library(testthat)
library(gt)

if (rlang::is_installed("qcthat")) {
  library(qcthat)
}

devtools::load_all()

qualification_test_paths <- list.files(
  here::here(
    'tests', 
    'testqualification', 
    'qualification'
    ),
  pattern = ".R",
  full.names = TRUE
  )

qualification_test_results <- purrr::map_df(
  qualification_test_paths, 
  function(x) {
    testResultsRaw <- testthat::test_file(
      x, 
      reporter = testthat::ListReporter, package = "qcthat") %>% 
      dplyr::as_tibble()
    
    return(testResultsRaw)
}) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(Tests = gsub("test_qual_", "", file),
         Tests = gsub(".R", "", Tests))
```

# Qualification Test Results

```{r}
gt::gt(qualification_test_results)
```
